content.title: Hi, Iâ€™m Kumar Shan. Nice to meet you.
content.intro:
15+ years of experience in website development. Expertise in engineering robust and user-centric solutions to drive breakthrough 
              efficiency and enhance the overall client experience. Proficient in guiding teams in a variety of environments 
              and executing mission-critical projects. For the last 15 years I have dedicated my life to building the best 
              developments on the web. I am very good at making them powerful, user-centric and able to offer you efficiency that improves 
              your experience. I have gained a lot of experience during this time and I can help bring out creativity in all kinds of environments as well.
